title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
- Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from 
Certain States) (No. 5) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 11th day of August
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 5) (amendment) (no 3) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 11th day august

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain 
States) (No. 5) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 135 of 2021) is amended by the 
substitution of the following definition for the definition of “vaccination 
certificate”: 

“ ‘vaccination certificate’ means - 

(a) 

an EU Digital Covid Certificate referred to in Article 3(1)(a) of 
the Digital Covid Certificate Regulation, or 

(b) 

a Covid-19 certificate that has been - 

(i) 

issued by a state other than a Member State, and 

(ii) 

recognised as equivalent to a certificate referred to in 
paragraph (a) pursuant to an implementing act adopted by 
the Commission in accordance with Article 3 or Article 8 
of the Digital Covid Certificate Regulation, 

that demonstrates that the person to whom it relates is a vaccinated 
person, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 or 

(c) 

a proof of vaccination.”. 

[420] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 August, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [420]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations made under Section 31A (inserted by section 10 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) 
amend S.I. No. 135/2021 to amend the definition of vaccination certificate. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [420] 5
